body_html:
I guess i have to stick to the pip installation, if you could please help me with (first comment/post -binary installation using pip)
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (48) : no kernel image is available for execution on the device at c:\new-builder_2\win-wheel\pytorch\aten\src\thcunn\generic/SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.cu:152
That should be good enough for me to get going.

Thanks
